verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Alleluia, Alleluia,
Alleluia, Alleluia,
Alleluia, Alleluia,
Alleluia, Alleluia.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He's my Savior, He's my Savior,
He's my Savior, He's my Savior,
He's my Savior, He's my Savior,
He's my Savior, He's my Savior.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He is worthy, He is worthy,
He is worthy, He is worthy,
He is worthy, He is worthy,
He is worthy, He is worthy.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I will praise Him, I will praise Him,
I will praise Him, I will praise Him,
I will praise Him, I will praise Him,
I will praise Him, I will praise Him.
